title: Pumpkin chiffon pie
ingredients: ['3 egg yolks', '100g caster sugar', '315g pumpkin puree', '120ml milk', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '2/3 (11g) sachet powdered gelatine', '4 tablespoons cold water', '3 egg whites, stiffly beaten', '100g caster sugar', '1 (23cm) baked shortcrust pastry case']
